name: Practice Makes Perfect
trigger: You or an ally within range fails a skill check for a skill in which you or they are trained.
details: The target gains a +2 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +3 bonus if the target has master or better proficiency in the skill. This bonus can change the outcome of the target's check.

name: Tireless Worker
details: You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that's affecting the target: clumsy, encumbered, enfeebled, or fatigued. If you don't remove the effect that caused the condition, the condition returns after the spell's duration expires.

name: Electrified Crystal Ward
details: You create an electric latch rune hazard (Core Rulebook 523) on the target, creating a special crystalline lock on the object. You can also substitute your spell DC for any of the hazard's listed DCs. You can have only one such hazard active at a time, and if you cast this spell while a previous electric latch rune is active, the older hazard discharges harmlessly.
